brief: This command updates an existing client class in the server configuration.
cmd-comment: The ``next-server``, ``server-hostname``, and ``boot-file-name`` are DHCPv4-specific. Only one client class can be updated with a single command.
cmd-syntax: "test": <test expression to be evaluated on incoming packets>,
name: class-update
resp-comment: The command returns the result of 3 (empty) if the client class does not exist. If the client class exists, the returned result is 0 if the update was successful, or 1 if the update is unsuccessful.
